attributes.review: This app is trash it’s always lagging ughhh do better trumpy 🙄 and apparently the I have to see an ugly guy every time I open the app I’m mortified 1 star !!! I wish I could give it 0 😡👏🏽 black lives matter too 💗🤎
attributes.title: do better 🤎

attributes.review: this is the worst app, I’ve ever had , my phone started to glitch when I got the app and then I see some orange guys nudes on my phone , this app is not horrible,, do not download,, u will get horrible images and will be terrified D:
attributes.title: no 💙

attributes.review: Seeing him support police brutality is a big hell no to me. That’s just ridiculous and not understanding that corona virus is real and spreading is also dumb. People need to grow up and realize what is truly happening and not be blinded by what he says
attributes.title: Yeah no

attributes.review: I don’t think I ever want to see this on the App Store again I hope he gets taken off this is so gross to look at children under the age of 17 are restricted from this app because of his scary face
attributes.title: no, disgusting

attributes.review: Terrible layout. Would have loved to see some better pictures. Doesn’t have any of the information I want. Honestly severely disappointed.
attributes.title: Not What I Expected

attributes.review: This app is disgusting !! I seen some graphic stuff in my life but this ?? This is the worst of it all . I could’ve even bare to describe how bad I’ve seen some pictures on here . Apple needs to remove this app .. IMMEDIATELY !
attributes.title: Delete This .

attributes.review: After I downloaded the app, there was this horrible smell that would make me gag everytime I even tried to open the app, not that I wanted to anyways BUT, yea. Unless you want a disgusting smell following you around, DONT DOWNLOAD. 🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮
attributes.title: Horrible Stench 🤮

attributes.review: It continuously crashed I even tried several times to reinstall the application but it didn’t work I’m quite disappointed
attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.userName: The miss talk to your manager

attributes.review: As a computer science major, it’s clear very little effort & time was put into the creation of this app, let alone the atrocious GUI. Given this is actually the official Trump app, I’m currently writing this review in awe. Just saying.
attributes.title: Not horrible, in fact disgusting.

attributes.review: I downloaded this app and the next night I woke up to the Cheeto standing in the corner of my room! I guess he used the app to track my location and stalk me. Needless to say downloading this app was the worst decision of my life.
attributes.title: Horrible
